messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Happy New Year, a real self-intro, and some  que...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/4/03 12:08:24 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... OH MY.. I know what you mean.. You slave over a meal, try to be so particular with it.. Then
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/4/03 12:08:24 PM Eastern Standard Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:

> While I (sometimes) appreciate honesty, the time may have come to have a
> talk with my son about tact at the dinner table.
>
>
> Betsy
>

OH MY.. I know what you mean.. You slave over a meal, try to be so particular
with it.. Then you get.. YUCK!.. THIS IS SO NASTY!.. BLECKKKK.. .. Makes me
wish I had just made mac and cheese from a box.. LOL.... BUT, I must say,
when they do really like what I prepared ( which, fortunately, is more often
than not) its worth every ounce of effort and every minute of time it took
to get it just right.. Needles to say, when I get it right, we have it
OFTEN.. . lol

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
